name: search_recent_reviews
description: Search for recent customer reviews for a specific product. Returns reviews from the last 7 days with their text, rating, sentiment, and platform information.

configuration.query: FROM customer_reviews | WHERE product == "{{product_name}}" | WHERE @timestamp >= NOW() - 7d | SORT @timestamp DESC | LIMIT 100

product_name.description: The name of the product to search reviews for (e.g., 'Product A', 'Product B', 'Product C')
